    • Method Detail

      • parse

        public abstract boolean parse(Scanner scanner,
                              Handler handler,
                              boolean alreadyMarked)
                       throws IOException
        Parse the input with this token.
        Parameters:
        scanner - Hold the input
        handler - Receive the parse event(s)
        alreadyMarked - Indicates whether the input was already marked (may occur when applying the whitespace policy)
        Returns:
        true if this token was matched, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        IOException - When an I/O exception occur.
